channel.title: Sound drivers
channel.description: Hello, I recently lost my Windows completely because of the retarded Ubuntu that I installed. Now I uninstalled ubuntu and installed windows back but it seems that my sound drivers are gone. I know that my computer uses Realtek AC97 drivers so I installed those but it seems that they won't go to the driver list in my computer -> properties -> hardware -> device manager and I can't hear any sound, it says "There is no audio drivers installed." It's really bugging me out, if someone could help me get my sound back it'd be appreciated.

item.title: Sound drivers
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:5, topic:150938”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=206541.msg1817176#msg1817176 date=1192163129]
Start > Run > dxdiag > sound.

Search for your sound card on google.
[/quote]The problem is that I don’t even have a sound card.[/quote]

If you don’t have a soundcard connected to your computer, then downloading a driver for a non-existent card won’t give you sound.

Read full topic

item.title: Sound drivers
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Yeah it’s built in, I cba to buy a sound card though, too expensive around here.

item.title: Sound drivers
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Tbh the exact same thing happened to me, i even think that may have been the same “realtek ac97” sound card, its built into the mobo right?

Well i got tired of trying to find the answer and ended up buying a cheapy $10 PCI sound card to replace it.

Read full topic

item.title: Sound drivers
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Hello, I recently lost my Windows completely because of the retarded Ubuntu that I installed. Now I uninstalled ubuntu and installed windows back but it seems that my sound drivers are gone. I know that my computer uses Realtek AC97 drivers so I installed those but it seems that they won’t go to the driver list in my computer -> properties -> hardware -> device manager and I can’t hear any sound, it says “There is no audio drivers installed.” It’s really bugging me out, if someone could help me get my sound back it’d be appreciated.

Read full topic
